item.title: Resident Evil Requiem ‘Flash Back to Grace’s Past’ gameplay, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A glimpse of protagonist Grace Ashcroft's dark past.

Capcom premiered new footage of Resident Evil Requiem during Gamescom 2025: Opening Night Live showcasing a glimpse of protagonist Grace Ashcroft’s dark past.

Here are the latest details:

Horror fans itching for the next taste of Resident Evil Requiem were treated to an extended look at the highly anticipated title at Gamescom Opening Night Live. The latest footage provides a glimpse of protagonist Grace Ashcroft’s dark past.

Set 30 years after the outbreak in Raccoon City, Resident Evil Requiem follows Grace on a new case where the young FBI analyst must return to the scene and face her tragic memories. This is a new era of survival horror.

The Resident Evil series will also celebrate its 30th anniversary in March 2026. In anticipation of this milestone, Capcom has revealed a 30th anniversary logo alongside a special illustration featuring Grace and other characters from the franchise’s storied history.

Resident Evil Requiem is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on February 27, 2026.

item.title: Ghost of Yotei free DLC ‘Legends’ announced; ‘Song of Vengeance’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Multiplayer mode returns in 2026.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer Sucker Punch Productions have released a new trailer for Ghost of Yotei dubbed “Song of Vengeance,” as well as announced that the game will receive the free multiplayer downloadable content “Legends” in 2026.

“Legends is our cooperative multiplayer mode featuring a fantastical, supernatural setting in contrast to the grounded world of Ghost of Yotei,” said Sucker Punch Productions senior communications manager Andrew Goldfarb on PlayStation Blog. “And just like Ghost of Tsushima Legends, Ghost of Yotei Legends will be free downloadable content for all Ghost of Yotei owners.”

Goldfarb continued, “Ghost of Yotei Legends will offer two-player story missions and four-player survival matches. This time around, you’ll play as one of four character classes and try to defeat demonic, giant versions of members of the Yōtei Six, plus a variety of new enemies that fight alongside them.”

Ghost of Yotei is due out for PlayStation 5 on October 2.

item.title: Onimusha: Way of the Sword ‘The Genma Experiments’ trailer, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

The Genma are cooking something special for Musashi.

Capcom has released a new trailer and screenshots for Onimusha: Way of the Sword introducing the Genma experiments.

Here are the latest details, via Capcom:

A flashy new trailer for Onimusha: Way of the Sword debuted in today’s showcase, delving into an eerie new locale within its dark fantasy world. The latest footage also revealed monstrous enemies and unsheathed a slice of the combat mechanics at the core of the swordplay action.

Deep beneath the game’s setting of Kyoto is a secret laboratory where a sinister and enigmatic entity known as Dokyo toils away creating new Genma. Her twisted creations include:

  • Greater Nue – A ferocious, Chimeric beast that can harness the power of lightning.
  • Kogashira – Humans warped by parasitic Genma that create poisonous clouds of Malice.
  • Chijiko – A grotesque mass of interwoven human faces with far-reaching tentacles.

To carve a path through these abominations, protagonist Musashi Miyamoto wields his own powers, including the iconic Issen and Soul Absorption abilities at the core of the Onimusha experience:

  • Deflect – A defensive action that reflects attacks back at enemies – including projectiles.
  • Parry – Well-timed blocks parrying incoming attacks can stagger foes, create openings for counterattacks, and even knock enemies back into their allies or terrain.
  • Blazing State – A temporary offensive power-up triggered by landing multiple parries that also generates Blue Souls fueling special attacks using Oni Power.
  • Soul Absorption – Choose the right moment in the heat of battle to absorb the souls of defeated foes to recover health, enhance equipment, unlock new abilities, and more.
  • Issen – Strike enemies a split-second before they land a blow to unleash this high-risk, high-reward counterattack that is an iconic element of the Onimusha series.

Onimusha: Way of the Sword is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam in 2026.
